alert.note: Alert for Cascade (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 05 at 8:23PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Montana, including the following counties, Cascade and Judith Basin. * WHEN...Until 1015 PM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 822 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Thunderstorms in the area have been observed to produce a half inch of rain in 30 minutes or less. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Geyser, Raynesford, Monarch and Sluice Boxes State Park. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
